name: Fast Food War
description:
CHARACTERS
  • Brown dog: player
  • Purple dog: your healer
  • White dogs: your enemies
  • Cat: white dogs' healer
  • Piggy: your friend who attacks the cat
HOW TO PLAY
  • Move: (SHIFT+) WASD/arrow keys
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Look: Mouse
  • Aim: Right click
  • Shoot: Left click
  • Main Menu: Backspace
  • Instructions: Escape

CREDITS

All credits for music and sound effects go to  Fesliyan Studios and Mixkit.
